descriptions.title: Dhāraṇī Recital
descriptions.content:
Related Terms

gzungs ‘don thabs, gzungs kha ton du bya ba

Example Texts

  • Sgo drug pa’i gzungs kyi ‘don thabs  
  • Gzungs sngags byin rlabs can 'don thabs dang bcas pa yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po 
  • Gzungs sngags zab mo kha ton du bya tshul
